p: Since diabetes, hypertension and cardiovascular disease are additional risk factors for thrombosis that is also associated to oxidative stress, the dietary supplement with natural compounds such as flavonoids, isoflavonoids, and terpenoids might be useful to reduce the risk of thrombosis reducing ROS levels and pro-inflammatory cytokines; in addition, they exercise anticoagulant effects, probably via the endogenous coagulation system and thus inhibit platelet aggregation/function or prothrombotic effects [ 13].
